column1: Table 1. Prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2006, and 2007
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Table 1. Prisoners under state or federal jurisdiction, December 31, 2000, 2006, and 2007
a/Includes prisoners under the legal authority of state or federalcorrectional officials.
b/Imprisonment rates are based on U.S. Census Bureau population estimates per 100,000 U.S. residents. Resident population estimates are as of January 1 in each year following the reference year.
